items.name: Jekyll Theme - Blogfolio
items.description: A Jekyll theme styled using Bulma with emphasis on blog posts and portfolio entries.

attributes.name: Jekyll
attributes.description: Transform your plain text into static websites and blogs.

attributes.name: Bulma
attributes.description: A modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

items.name: MOVIE DB
items.description: A personal movie database. It queries a third party API service called TMDb in search of the requested movie. The user can then add the movie to his/her own list of favorite movies. This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

attributes.name: TMDb
attributes.description: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
